translations: n.旋风，龙卷风；骗子，不老实的人；旋转球；缠绕者

sentences.sentence: Tuscaloosa Mayor Maddox told CNN that the twister literally obliterated blocks and blocks of the city.
sentences.translation: 塔斯卡卢萨市长马德克斯告诉 CNN，龙卷风几乎夷平这个城市的一个又一个街区。

sentences.sentence: This twister stayed in the open country, away from people or buildings, rotating at 120 mph but only moving at 5 mph.
sentences.translation: 该龙卷风停留在开阔的乡野，远离人群和建筑，以每小时120英里的时速旋转，但仅以每小时5英里的时速移动。

sentences.sentence: We had just finished a game of Twister when the door bell rang.
sentences.translation: 我们刚玩完扭扭游戏，门铃就响了。
